title: Design Dashboard UI
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the main dashboard using Figma.

title: Develop Task Management Logic
description: Implement CRUD functionality for tasks and state management.

title: Integrate Charting Library
description: Add Recharts to visualize task data on the dashboard.

title: Implement LocalStorage Persistence
description: Ensure all tasks are saved to and loaded from the browser's localStorage.

title: Setup Responsive Design
description: Make the application fully responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop views.

title: Write Unit Tests
description: Add unit tests for critical components and utility functions.

title: Deploy to GitHub Pages
description: Prepare the project for deployment and host it on GitHub Pages.

title: Review User Feedback
description: Gather feedback from initial users and plan for the next iteration.
